Class Configuration

java.lang.Object
  Configuration

public class Configuration
extends java.lang.Object

Class for displaying open handles

This class is resposible for running the volatility command to list open handles in the RAM image. Because volatility takes considerable time to run each command, this command is run only once. The output is stored in a Text file which is recalled every time a user requests the list of opened handles, using the provided tab in the GUI

Version:
1.0
Author:
Chirag Barot

selectFile

public void selectFile()
This method is used to select the vol.py file and memory dump file. Also retrieving the path of the vol.py file and memory dump file is being done here.

Setting up a JFrame in order, for the user to select the vol.py file and the memory dump file.

Setting up an action listener for the volButton and the selectDump, this is done to handle the events of the volButton and the selectDump. Such as opening up a dialog box to browse into vol.py file and memory dump file.

readFile

public void readFile()
              throws java.io.IOException
This method is used to read from file.

Throws:
java.io.IOException - if the file doesn't exist it will throw an exception
